"Holo-phone" - A smartphone with a holographic display that allows users to view and interact with 3D objects and videos in mid-air.
"Mind-phone" - A smartphone that can read and respond to users' thoughts, allowing them to control the device without touching or speaking.
"Flexi-phone" - A smartphone with a flexible, rollable screen that can be expanded to different sizes and shapes, depending on the user's needs.
"Smart-watch" - A smartwatch that can function as a standalone smartphone, with all the features and capabilities of a full-sized device in a compact, wearable form.
"Solar-phone" - A smartphone that can be charged using solar power, making it ideal for use in remote areas or during power outages.
